events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter detailing their experience.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's experience and job requirements.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to handle the candidate’s profile and coordinate the next steps.
An initial screening call was conducted successfully to assess the candidate’s technical skills, motivation, and overall fit for the software engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm to proceed to the technical interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to evaluate their coding skills and problem-solving ability in detail.
